name: WordOftheDay
0:
”Alexa, ask word of the day to give me word of the day”
”Alexa, ask word of the day to get me word of the day”
”Alexa, ask word of the day to tell me word of the day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word of the day
des: Start your day with learning the word of the day. Your vocabulary will increase day by day. Start impressing your friends and family with this skill. You will enjoy it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
